summaryPoints: Tutored full-stack web development principles in Python, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS reviewing code for 17 different students and building sample web applications.

Collected feedback and coordinated actionable improvement goals between 17 students and 6 administrative staff to plan meals, recreational events, and housing accommodations reinforcing communication and enhancing productivity.

Audited webpages in Southland Roofing Incâ€™s domain for actionable improvements in loading speed, mobile integration, and accessibility; identified and corrected issues across 5 business-critical pages increasing website speed by 50% and organic Google Search traffic by 10%.
Developed accessible, business-oriented user interfaces, assessing design standards and business priorities with marketers and designers improving traffic to relevant webpages by 30%.

Designed, proposed, and developed a full-stack web application in a team of two, maintaining industry standards for mobile-first development, version control, and quality via code reviews with professional software engineers.
Leveraged and contributed to open-source software to asynchronously integrate computer vision, resource scraping, and a React UI.
Collaborated remotely in a team of 3 using Java, JavaScript, HTML, CSS and Google Cloud Platform APIs to build a messaging web application over the course of 12 weeks.
Learned and followed industry best practices such as conducting regular code reviews, extending an existing codebase, designing new components and interfaces, and leading them to completion.
